test.name: Assert Incorrect String Input Type Message

kw.name: Given I open a headless browser
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: When I navigate to the Factorial website
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: And I enter the interger abc and Select Calculate
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Then I should see the correct result for abc
Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.name: Assert Terms & Conditions Page Navigation

kw.name: Given I open a headless browser
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: When I navigate to the Factorial website
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: And I click on the terms and conditions link
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I should land on the terms and conditions page
Wait Until Location Is
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL is ``expected``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

test.name: Assert Privacy Page Navigation

kw.name: Given I open a headless browser
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: When I navigate to the Factorial website
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: And I click on the privacy link
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I should land on the privacy page
Wait Until Location Is
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL is ``expected``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.msg: Location did not become 'http://qainterview.pythonanywhere.com/privacy' in 5 seconds.

kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.name: Assert Company Page Navigation

kw.name: Given I open a headless browser
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: When I navigate to the Factorial website
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: And I click on the company footer link
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I should land on the company page
Wait Until Location Is
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL is ``expected``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
